com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.interfaces

Interface SeatDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeatDaoImpl

    public interface SeatDao
    SeatDao is an Interface class which has all the methods to query the seats table in the Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
